Topic.Title: Homeland survival feedback request & DLC announcment

Posts.EditableText:
Just released my first game Homeland Survival. Looking for people to play and give me some feedback

You wake up with amnesia. Who are you, where are you, and most importantly who is the mysterious figure who keeps sending you messages. Who is A.L outage. 
Survive in this open world finding clues to why the power has failed. Or enter the wild and explore the multiple environments coming across new locations.
every 40 seconds your Health goes down one percent due to the new Hunger timer.
 and most importantly remember A.L outage.

First Downloadable content releasing February 1st

Posts.EditableText: How did you find it, Jay? The game is unlisted
Posts.HTML: How did you find it, Jay? The game is unlisted

Posts.EditableText:
I used the Quest desktop client, and went to Play and then picked "New Uploads". It was there a few days ago.

Since it's now unlisted, I've removed the link.
